summary: CONSUMER WAS TRAVELING ON THE HIGHWAY A LOUD BANG NOISE WAS HEARD COMING FROM FRONT.  CONSUMER PULLED OVER. DRIVER 'S SIDE DOOR SHEARED OFF, AND WAS HANGING  BY THE  TOP BOLT.  ALSO,  STEERING WHEEL FAILED TO MOVE OR TURN ON ITS OWN.  POWER STEERING FLUID WAS LEAKING FROM UNDERNEATH THE VEHICLE.  IN ADDITION,  TAILGATE CABLES SHEARED OFF WHILE PLACING HEAVY EQUIPMENT ON TOP OF IT.  CONSUMER HAD THE VEHICLE TOWED TO THE DEALER FOR INSPECTION, AND MECHANIC DETERMINED THAT DOOR NEEDED TO BE REPLACED ON  THE DRIVER 'S SIDE. ALSO,  STEERING PUMP  NEEDED TO BE REPLACED, AND THE TAILGATE  PART WAS ON BACK ORDER.  *AK   ENGINE WAS BACKFIRING.  *AK
